title: The Depressing Turn of Positivity
body:
So this weekend I decided to play league with one single intent is to be consistently positive and just in general in, have fun. (Both Ranked and normals, blind and draft) I had the usual fun of playing league, but voicing positivity, every game that i played besides from 2 had everyone being negative from, me receiving comments to eat dirt, and more that I really rather not say, after doing this for this weekend it really drained me, being constantly harassed for what seems no reason for just normally starting the game by saying 'Good luck beautifuls! Have fun!

Im not entirely sure my reason in posting this, i just thought it was really sad and had really killed my mood for playing League of legends. With all this im not sure i really want to play league for awhile after this, especially since my friends dont play league anymore

replies.body:
I should get you to play with me. 
I can get people hyped right from the start and get the game rolling. It's a fun banty kinda game in the end.
Do yourself a favour and block everything out (disable chats), play the game for yourself ;)

Positive in League, lol, you're a fool if you thought that was gonna do anything good

This game is one of the most toxic games (Up there with CoD, CSGO, etc) at no point was positivity going to do anything as you would expect, since the Passive-Aggressive trolls use positivity to flame

Give up on league if you don't like negativity, it won't change

good to hear some positive feedback in the community but this game is really toxic and i had even had a run in with a toxic support member you can't really escape toxic yeah it's upsetting but i would recommend playing solo player games or games that your friends play as that's a good way on how to deal with it after my ban for an apparent purpose int i just stopped playing because if you can have toxic players in your game and u just feel so upset your don't think. If that mindset can be banned for 14 days i just gave up with league personally would recommend before you put way to much money on this game.
